description:
Taylor Aims and Adam made a little bet the other day. Each of them had slept with the same girl, and each was told that they had a huge cock. It was only a matter of time before the tape measure came out and these two studs were comparing peckers.

We won't tell you who won, but once the results were in, the loser had to suck and get fucked by the winner. Needless to say, there's a lot of sucking and ass fucking in this scene. It gets hot!

Enjoy!
title: Adam & Taylor Aims
